basics.name: Sreelakshmi Kutty
basics.label: Network Operations Engineer
basics.summary: I am a recent graduate from the University of Arizona, earning a Bachelor of Science in Bioinformatics. In 2024, I moved from Hawaii to Denver! Welcome to my page!

education.area: candidate for a degree in Bioinformatics
courses: Statistics and Data Visualization with R

education.area: 45 credits towards a degree in Civil Environmental Engineering (and a minor in Computer Science)
